BALI JIMBARAN BEACH

BALI JIMBARAN BEACH IS BEAUTIFUL BEACH AT FISHERMAN VILLAGE AND IS PERFECT PLACE FOR ENJOY FRESH LOCAL SEAFOOD DINNER

Bali Jimbaran Beach is located between airport and bukit pecatu with original villages of kedonganan and Jimbaran itself. These2 traditional villages lay on a stretch of around 2 kilometers barrow lowland between Bali mainland and the foot of south Bali. Jimbaran and Kedonganan are under the administration of perbekelan Jimbaran or Desa Jimbaran, while desa jimbaran is under wide administrative area of Kecamatan Kuta. Jimbaran Beach is always the center of attention when we talk about seafood, because there are most restaurants on the beach that serve seafood, basically all the restaurants here are the same, namely the menu is seafood, the only difference is the service from each restaurant here, Enjoy dinner on the beach accompanied by the sound of the rumbling waves that will add to the excitement at dinner

All you need to know about Jimbaran Beach :

  • History name Jimbaran

Jimbaran Fish Market Village

In Jimbaran Kedonganan village there is a fish market where the residents here mostly work as fishermen and the catch is sold to the fish market in Jimbaran, and if you want to find fish, you can come here in the morning, guaranteed the fish you get is fresh and just got off the boat. Jimbaran kedonganan villages have been known as the biggest supplier of salted fish for whole Bali, and until now. The market market in Jimbaran is managed by the Koperasi Unit Desa here, where the fishermen who have finished catching fish will give the catch to the market administrators of this market for resale to consumers. If you come in the morning and can see many fishing boats anchored on the beach from fishing boats in the ocean, and many wholesale fish traders from Bali line up here to buy fish to the management of the Koperasi Unit Desa

History name Jimbaran

The short history of the name Jimbaran, comes from the kingdom of Klungkung, where the king named Ida Dewa Agung has two wives named Sri Ratu Dalem namely Sri Ratu Dalem Putih, where Sri Ratu Dalem does not have a son, while Sri Ratu Dalem Putih has a child named by the king is Dalem White and Dalem Ireng. However, since Dalam Ireng had begun to learn to stand and walk, the king's attitude gradually turned into a hatred for his second wife and two sons. And finally expelled his second wife, while carrying his two children and moving - moving finally the mother felt overwhelmed and left one of her children named Dalem Putih in the forest, and was found by the magic hermit and finally taken care of by the magic hermit. Over time the Dalem Putih grew into an adult, and one day the magic hermit died and the white dalem felt very sad and because there was no one take care, Dalem Putih decided to look for his brother who was brought by his mother, and finally he went to uluwatu and met Dalem Ireng and Dalem Putih did not even know that what they met was his brother, and there were disputes and quarrels because of misunderstandings, and finally they both knew that they were brothers. Furthermore, Dalem Ireng prefers to be a wanderer and Dalem Putih deepens the medical knowledge he got from a powerful hermit in Uluwatu. In the north of Uluwatu, Dalem Putih decided to clear a new forest. Because of the area, the area is called "Jimbaran" from the word "jimbar" which means broad.

Jimbaran Beach Exotic Seafood

When we hear the name Jimbaran beach, the first thing that pops into our minds is seafood, it is true that Jimbaran is the center of local seafood because it is located in the Jimbaran fish village, where most of the fish caught are sold to restaurants on the beach here. imbaran Bay Beach has both lovely beach and the most exotic seafood in Indonesia. Seafood cafes aligning on jimbaran beach next to intercontinental hotel are indeed exceptional. Situated within a peaceful fisherman village, these cafes started out as huts which eventually grew in to an established industry. Jimbaran Bay Beach was always just a small fishing village, but in the 1980's developers moved in to exploit its glorious beaches. However it is still very much a fishing village and it is always pleasing to see when villagers have directly benefited from tourism. Jimbaran Bay Village, is the home to some of the best known international hotel names which straddle the bay and luxury villas are perched on the hillside with enviable views over the bay. The Jimbaran Bay Beach around the hotels are, as you would expect, stunning and it is a safe area for swimming. Around the village and fish market it is very much a working area for the fisherman tending their boats and nets and sorting their catch for market.

Sunset Dinner at Jimbaran Beach

The Jimbaran Bay Beach takes on a whole new dimension as sunset approaches. They recently spread out to areas on the way to Ngurah Rai Airport. The flavor of their dishes is exquisite. Fresh seafood grilled on coconut charcoal served with flavorsome spices will undoubtedly stimulate you!! You can ick your favorite seafood prawns, lobsters, squids or fishes. Waiting on your food, you can sit around on soft white sands and watch the sunset in the evening. There are many restaurants come alive when they set up their candlelit tables down to the waters edge. The chefs fire up their outside kitchens and prepare their menus of seafood just as carloads of hungry mouths arrive to watch the sun setting whilst sipping cocktails before dinner. A romantic atmosphere is when the sun goes down, here you see the beautiful sunset on the beach with your partner, and in the evening sitting at a table by candlelight which makes the atmosphere even more romantic, perfect for those of you who want to add closeness to your relationship with your partner, and can come here and enjoy dinner with a sunset view on jimbaran beach

Beautiful White Sand at Jimbaran Beach

Jimbaran Beach has beautiful white sand along the coast with clean sea water, making this place an ideal place to spend time in the afternoon or morning for swimming. Because it has a nice beach with white sand and is located in a fish village in Jimbaran, where most of the residents work as fishermen, there are lots of cafes along the beach, while the food menu here is seafood purchased from local fishermen here. Jimbaran Beach Bali is very crowded because the beach is also very clean and cleaning staff are provided to maintain the beauty of this beach so that it supports the beach atmosphere to be beautiful and feel at home for long here. If you have time during your vacation in Bali, it would be nice if you visit Jimbaran beach with all the beauty of the beach and it is very suitable for couples, when night falls at the restaurant, candles are used as lighting which will make the atmosphere very romantic.
